com.feilong.core.util.transformer

Class BeanTransformer<I,O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.feilong.core.util.transformer.BeanTransformer<I,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - 输入类型
    O - 输出类型
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Transformer<I,O>

    public class BeanTransformer<I,O>
extends Object
implements Transformer<I,O>, Serializable
    将传入的bean转成指定类型 toBeanType 的Bean 的转换器.

    如果只需要转换特定的属性(忽略其他属性),此时可以使用 includePropertyNames 属性;
    如果没有传递此属性,那么默认会转换所有的属性

    Since:
    1.10.1
    Author:
    feilong
    See Also:
    BeanToPropertyValueTransformer, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BeanTransformer(Class<O> toBeanType, String... includePropertyNames)
      Instantiates a new bean transformer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      O transform(I inputBean) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BeanTransformer

        public BeanTransformer(Class<O> toBeanType,
                       String... includePropertyNames)
        Instantiates a new bean transformer.

        如果 toBeanType 是null,抛出 NullPointerException

        Parameters:
        toBeanType - 转成Bean的类型.
        includePropertyNames - 包含的属性数组名字数组,(can be nested/indexed/mapped/combo),如果是null或者empty,那么复制所有的属性

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        public O transform(I inputBean)
        Specified by:
        transform in interface Transformer<I,O>
